title: Mid Silver looking for a Diamond + Coach (Can pay)
body:
Hi, I'm currently Silver 4 , close to getting to Silver 3 and I'm looking for someone who can act as a long term coach. I would like to hit Gold this season and continue improving from there. I'm therefore looking for a coach who is in Diamond or higher. I'm happy to pay a little bit per session but I'm not particularly rich, so we can discuss that. Essentially I'd want you to watch replays with me and analyse my gameplay, spectate me to see what I'm doing wrong still, and even duo with me so you can correct me in real time. 

Add me on league: MetaHew if interested, or respond here with a method of contact.
Thanks!

replies.body: ill do it for free we could duo even cause im fuking gold this season LBAWS

What roles are you looking for coaching in? My best roles are Top, Jungle and Mid. My bot lane knowledge is of solo queue low Diamond level only.

I am happy to work something out with you to your budget without leaving you to eat only bread.

I am in Adelaide if that gives you an idea of Time Zone to work things out.

(Posting from a smurf), happy to add and chat in game if you wish to discuss more mate.

My main roles are Top, Jg and Support. Jungle and support more so these days. 

Give me an add and we'll have a talk :D
